news.title: Drake, Beyoncé, and Lil Wayne Producer Omen Dies at 49
news.summary: The DJ and producer also made beats for artists in the early Roc-A-Fella Records orbit and worked on Ludacris’ Grammy-winning 2006 album Release Therapy

news.title: Addison Rae Stars in Trailer for New Netflix Show Monster: The Ed Gein Story: Watch
news.summary: Rae will appear in the latest installment of Ryan Murphy and Ian Brennan’s anthology series as Evelyn Hartley, an alleged victim of the murderer and grave robber
